name: Ripped The Life
description:
This game was made for Ludum Dare 44 game jam

Ripped The Life is a game in which you can take life and give it back to anything that moves. When something is 'out of life' it moves slower and vice versa. Use this mechanic to solve simple puzzles.
Controls:

  • A/D or Arrows to move
  • Space/W/Up arrow to jump
  • Left click to throw spell (to take life or give life)
  • Right click to throw spell at yourself
